resources.string: Screening...
"Don't interrupt casting when the phone's screen turns off. This feature might increase power consumption."
"Don't cast floating notifications, incoming call notifications, and other items that might contain personal information"
Minimize the projected window to be able to use other features of your phone while casting
Annuler
"Make sure that the wireless casting feature is turned on on the target device. View help if you have problems connecting."
"Recherche d'appareils à proximité…"
Cast when screen is off
"Casting won't be interrupted when your phone's screen turns off. Press the Power button on your phone to turn the screen back on."
Annuler
Ok
About to cast with the screen off

"Casting is projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor. It allows you to share images and videos with your friends and family, and even to play games together. Power consumption of your phone doesn't normally change when you use this feature."
Step 1

"1. Use the small millet hand phone to connect to the small millet TV, you can establish a vertical screen connection without the network environment. 2. Some Xiaomi TVs or other brand TVs that do not support smart screening, you need to connect your TV (or large screen device) to your mobile phone to the same wireless network."
Step 2
Step 3

"Xiaomi mobile phone can directly connect to most of the Xiaomi TV with Bluetooth tooth function, instead of manually opening the Miracast function. If you need to manually open the Miracast function, you can press the [Menu] button of the TV remote control to select me on the TV screen. Applications > Wireless Screening > Millet / Android Miracas."

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [MENU] button on the remote control and then select Settings > Connection > Network > Multiple screens.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SMART] button on the remote control and then select Casting > Wireless Display;Some models can click Hi Screen > Game Screening > Android.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Casting > Android device > Miracast.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". On some other models, you can turn this feature on in Networks > Wi-Fi Direct. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Screen Mirroring.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select System > System Tools > Multiple Screens > Screen Mirroring.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Wireless Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. To turn this feature on, go to My Apps > Wi-Fi Display.
AODIN customer support: 400-810-5858
LeTV
Please make sure that your large screen device model supports the Miracast protocol. On some models, select Settings > Network > Multi-screen Interactive > Wireless Display.
LeTV customer service phone: 10109000
View more features
同意

" • WIFI network permissions are used to discover and connect devices. •Bluetooth is used to discover and connect devices. •Read the phone storage After reading the content, cast the content to the big screen device. •Get phone information Read the phone IMEI, Android_id, version and log information recording. •After reading the sound, cast the sound to the large screen device. •Targeting permissions Locate and discover surrounding devices."

This function is not available in split screen mode
After opening the application you want to cast, use the small window projection function, the screened application will not be interrupted, and the mobile phone can operate other applications.
Please use the small window to cast screen in the app.
